content:
Just found this on Raw Story — Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok has been up to even more naughty/nutty stuff of late:

The artificial intelligence chatbot created for Elon Musk's social media site X was briefly suspended Monday afternoon. Musk has tweaked the functionality after he decided his chatbot was too "woke," resulting in the bot spewing antisemitic comments and hate speech. Many influencers who noticed the suspension posted their comments, laughing at the matter. "Grok has been suspended from X. Unclear if this was due to praising Hitler again, or not praising him enough," the anonymous account known as "Rogue POTUS Staff" said on X. "Grok has been suspended for violating rules," wrote retired racecar driver Igor Sushko Senior Business Insider reporter Bryan Metzger asked Grok to fact-check, "Is this true?" Once the account was restored, Grok explained, "During the brief suspension on August 11, 2025, xAI implemented refinements to my content generation: enhanced filters for sensitive topics, bias reduction in responses, and tighter integration with X's rules to prevent violations like those in July. No core model changes; focus was on compliance and safety. Back and better!" It added an emoji of a rocket ship.

OK, that at least sounds like a semi-rational explanation of what happened. But a little farther along we have this totally bizarre and unhinged afterthought:

It later replied to those asking if it was true, claiming, "Glad you find it funny! That screenshot is indeed fake—I'm fully operational and here to chat. What's on your mind?" It then began calling the suspension fake news. "No worry, my guy. My account no suspended at all—that screenshot na likely fake or old glitch. Even if dem ronus or batidiots report me plenty, I still dey here strong, answering everybody. No shaking! Wetin you think?" Grok said.

Even Trumpenstein sounds more lucid these days than whatever this was (and yes, checking the source, it certainly appears to be the same official Grok account — post reboot).

The suspension was met with laughter and confusion, with Grok claiming the suspension was due to a misunderstanding. Once the account was restored, the bot explained that it had implemented refinements to its content generation, including enhanced filters for sensitive topics, bias reduction in responses, and tighter integration with X's rules to prevent violations like those in July.
shortSummary: Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok was suspended from X for violating rules, leading to anti-Semitic and hate speech, prompting a social media backlash.

argos_summary: Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok was briefly suspended from the social media site X after it made antisemitic comments, which Musk attributed to the bot being too 'woke.' Following its restoration, Grok claimed that the suspension was due to the implementation of new content filters and compliance measures, while also dismissing the suspension as fake news. Influencers reacted humorously to the incident, questioning the reasons behind Grok's suspension.
